text.title: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life

head.s: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life

p.s: We all have our own rights to do things that we want to do but do we make the right choice if we do it ?
If you want to bring the right quality to human life , here are some steps you can use as a guide .

item.s: Be friendly to others .
We all have to be friendly to each other .
We are all the same , all human , but all different to each other and being different is a good thing .
We do n't even look the same , so our personalities are all different too .
We ca n't judge someone because they are different from us .
Think about what would happen if everyone was the same ?
Would our life be interesting ?
Would their be anything different in life to learn ?

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 1.jpg

item.s: Help others .
We should all help each other if we see others are struggling with things .
Imagine you had something that you were struggling with and no one to help you .
What would you do ?
How would you do it ?
Will it work if you are doing what you are doing ?

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 2.jpg

item.s: Take care of those in special need .
We should all try to go to visit someone who is in hospital and take care of this we know that are ill or in pain .
Think how it feels to be all alone without any friends when you are suffering .
Would you like it if no one came to visit you ?

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 3.jpg

item.s: Do n't let others risk their lives .
Someone is drowning .
What do you do ?

( You think of anything that will save them , the best thing that will save them would be some think that floats ) throw them a floating hoop , if there is nothing that floats go and dive to save them .

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 4.jpg

item.s: Never break the laws .
Like stealing , killing someone , rape etc.
These are the worst things that you could do in life to someone .

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 5.jpg

item.s: Be happy with the things in life .
If you are not happy , think why are you not happy .
Think how can you improve it or do it ?
Will I be able to do it ?
If you ca n't do it think to yourself that you are lucky for the things you have that some people might not have ?

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 6.jpg

item.s: Be a better person .
Some people do mean things because of how they were treated when they where younger .
But you can change your life into a better life then being mean .
We all have good and bad things in us .
Find yourself some good friends to hang around with , to play basketball , go to the cinema , go to the club and shopping .

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 7.jpg

item.s: Understand that some people steal because they take drugs .
There is a good drug called the African Iboga plant .
But it costs a lot of money .
If you could make this for free this would change the whole world .
Imagine a place where no one takes drugs , does n't smoke and does n't have any silly habits .
There will be less criminal things happening around the world like killing , stealing , etc.
People do n't do things without a reasons there is a reason to why people do it .

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 8.jpg

item.s: Encourage children to meditate .
People should make every child do meditation .
In schools they should teach them how to relax .
If somebody really wants to something bad they could meditate and relax and not do anything bad at all but instead , go and do something nice .
In schools they should do a relaxation room where they do meditation .
If someone gets bullied they could go and meditate to make themselves feel better .
It might be a good idea if they teach children about differences .

figure.rend: Bring the Right Quality to Human Life Step 9.jpg

item.s: Learn and teach self defence .
They should teach children how to protect themselves from bullies and how to react and not react .
There are some reaction that could make a bully want to bully you even more .
Go and read some articles about bullying .
They should teach children some stuff from wikiHow .
